Name: ENGLISH. Current work.
Content:
{\rtf1\ansi\ansicpg1251\deff0\nouicompat\deflang1049{\fonttbl{\f0\fnil\fcharset0 Roboto Condensed;}{\f1\fnil\fcharset204 Roboto Condensed;}{\f2\fnil Roboto Condensed;}}

\pard\cf1\f0\fs24\lang1033 ###ENGLISH. Current work.\par
2019. May. STUDY ARTICLE 22 Improve Your Study Habits!\par
\par
p. 1 - 4.\par
\par
1. Why might some not be inclined to study?\par
IT TAKES a great deal of effort to earn a living these days. Many of our brothers work long hours just to provide the necessities of life for their families. Countless others spend several hours each workday traveling to and from their place of employment. Many support themselves by doing hard physical labor. By the end of the day, these hardworking brothers and sisters are exhausted! The last thing many are inclined to do is study.\par
\par
2. \par
\par
\par
##\f1\lang1049\'fd\'f2\'e8 \'e2\'fb\'f0\'e0\'e6\'e5\'ed\'e8\'ff \'ff \'f5\'ee\'f7\'f3 \'ee\'f7\'e5\'ed\'fc \'f5\'ee\'f0\'ee\'f8\'ee \'f3\'f1\'e2\'ee\'e8\'f2\'fc \'e8 \'e8\'f1\'ef\'ee\'eb\'fc\'e7\'ee\'e2\'e0\'f2\'fc\f0\lang1033\par
a great deal of effort - \f1\lang1049\'ec\'ed\'ee\'e3\'ee \'f3\'f1\'e8\'eb\'e8\'e9\par
a great deal of\f0\lang1033  - \f1\lang1049\'e7\'ed\'e0\'f7\'e8\'f2\'e5\'eb\'fc\'ed\'ee\'e5 \'ea\'ee\'eb\'e8\'f7\'e5\'f1\'f2\'e2\'ee; \'e8\'e7\'f0\'ff\'e4\'ed\'ee\'e5 \'ea\'ee\'eb\'e8\'f7\'e5\'f1\'f2\'e2\'ee; \'ec\'ed\'ee\'e3\'ee\f0\lang1033\par
to earn a living - \f1\lang1049\'e7\'e0\'f0\'e0\'e1\'e0\'f2\'fb\'e2\'e0\'f2\'fc \'ed\'e0 \'e6\'e8\'e7\'ed\'fc\par
the necessities of life - \'ef\'f0\'e5\'e4\'ec\'e5\'f2\'fb \'ef\'e5\'f0\'e2\'ee\'e9 \'ed\'e5\'ee\'e1\'f5\'ee\'e4\'e8\'ec\'ee\'f1\'f2\'e8\par
\f0\lang1033 they are \f1\lang1049 exhausted\f0\lang1033 .\par
to be inclined - \f1\lang1049\'e1\'fb\'f2\'fc \'f1\'ea\'eb\'ee\'ed\'ed\'fb\'ec\par
\f0\lang1033 countless \par
labor \f1\lang1049\'f2\'f0\'f3\'e4 / \'f2\'f0\'f3\'e4\'e8\'f2\'fc\'f1\'ff\f0\lang1033\par
necessity for a decision\par
in case of necessity\par
necessity is the mother of invention - \f1\lang1049 (\'ef\'ee\'f1\'eb)\f0\lang1033  \f1\lang1049\'e3\'ee\'eb\'fc \'ed\'e0 \'e2\'fb\'e4\'f3\'ec\'ea\'e8 \'f5\'e8\'f2\'f0\'e0 \f0\lang1033\par
\f1\lang1049 +\'ed\'f3\'e6\'e4\'e0 - \'ec\'e0\'f2\'fc \'e8\'e7\'ee\'e1\'f0\'e5\'f2\'e0\'f2\'e5\'eb\'fc\'ed\'ee\'f1\'f2\'e8\par
Shortage \'ed\'e5\'f5\'e2\'e0\'f2\'ea\'e0, \'e4\'e5\'f4\'e8\'f6\'e8\'f2, \'ed\'e5\'e4\'ee\'f1\'f2\'e0\'f2\'ee\'ea, \'ed\'e5\'e4\'ee\'e1\'ee\'f0\par
\'ee\'f1\'f2\'f0\'e0\'ff \'ed\'e5\'f5\'e2\'e0\'f2\'ea\'e0 desperate shortage\par
\'f0\'e0\'f1\'f2\'f0\'ee\'e3\'e0\'f2\'fc \'ea\'ee\'e3\'ee-\'eb. \'e4\'ee \'e3\'eb\'f3\'e1\'e8\'ed\'fb \'e4\'f3\'f8\'e8 - to pull at smb.'s heartstrings\f0\lang1033\par
by the end of the day\par
\par
At the same time\par
At the same time, it gives our delegation a great deal of food for thought.\par
\par
I lack the courage to interfere. \par
It's mercy, compassion, and forgiveness I lack.\par
\par
Many of these people lack the basic necessities of life.\par
deprived of the bare necessities of life\f2  \emdash  \f1\lang1049\'eb\'e8\'f8\'e5\'ed\'ed\'fb\'e9 \'f1\'e0\'ec\'ee\'e3\'ee \'ed\'e5\'ee\'e1\'f5\'ee\'e4\'e8\'ec\'ee\'e3\'ee\f0\lang1033 .\par
\par
\f1\lang1049\par
}
WorkText:
{\rtf1\ansi\ansicpg1251\deff0\nouicompat\deflang1049{\fonttbl{\f0\fnil\fcharset0 Roboto Condensed;}{\f1\fnil\fcharset204 Roboto Condensed;}}
{\colortbl ;\red124\green252\blue0;}
{\*\generator Riched20 10.0.19041}\viewkind4\uc1 
\pard\cf1\f0\fs24\lang1033 What is your place of employment?\par
To find a nice friend it takes a great deal of effort.\par
If you want to have an expensive car you must labor a lot.\par
\par
>>> 06-05-2021 00:20\par
I have spent several hours solving a problem in my project.\par
I had spent several hours solving a problem in my project when my wife asked me to have a walk together.\par
I am not inclined to lie because my Heavenly Father has taught me.\par
My son is inclined to study the Bible. Actually he asks me every day to teach him.\par
It takes a great deal of time to get better in English.\par
I am ready to spend a great deal of time to get better in English.\par
I am ready to spend a great deal of time to study things that I lack.\par
\par
>>> 07-05-2021 01:08\par
My cat is inclined to go out and hunt mice.\par
Right now I am not inclined to be with your opinion.\par
Zagra was inclined to lie close me and to breath into my face.\par
There we did hard physical labor. Countless mosquitoes drove us insane.\par
Our necessities of life were about to run out.\par
The source of water was 2 km away from our camp, and we had to travel to that place twice a day.\par
I spent a couple of hours to get to the source.\par
These days most of people can only earn a necessities of life. (g)Most people these days can only earn money for the bare necessities.\par
(\f1\lang1049\'ed\'f3\'e6\'ed\'ee \'f1\'ea\'ee\'f0\'e5\'e5 \'f1\'f2\'e0\'f0\'e0\'f2\'fc\'f1\'ff \'ef\'f0\'ee\'e3\'ee\'e2\'ee\'f0\'e8\'f2\'fc \'ec\'fb\'f1\'eb\'fc \'e2 \'e3\'ee\'eb\'ee\'e2\'e5, \'f2\'ee\'eb\'fc\'ea\'ee \'ef\'ee\'f2\'ee\'ec \'ef\'e8\'f1\'e0\'f2\'fc. \'e8\'ed\'e0\'f7\'e5 \'f2\'e0\'ea \'e3\'ee\'eb\'ee\'e2\'e0 \'ec\'e5\'ed\'fc\'f8\'e5 \'ed\'e0\'e3\'f0\'f3\'e6\'e0\'e5\'f2\'f1\'ff, \'e5\'e5\'f1\'eb\'e8 \'ef\'e8\'f1\'e0\'f2\'fc \'f1\'eb\'ee\'e2\'e0 \'f1\'f0\'e0\'e7\'f3\f0\lang1033 )\f1\lang1049 .\par
\par
>>> 08-05-2021 01:31\par
\f0\lang1033 It takes a great deal of effort to fish an octopus.\par
Each father has to provide the nesessities of live for his family.\f1\lang1049\par
\f0\lang1033 How does my mom teach students so far?\f1\lang1049\par
\f0\lang1033 After we whole day were walking in the forest we were exhausted.\par
After walking whole day in the forest we were exhausted.\f1\lang1049\par
\f0\lang1033 What have I done today?\par
I have developed a module of my big project.\par
The module can count the time of my work.\par
The thing is that it is important for me to know how much time I spent doing each single part of a project I have planned to do. (spend on smth).\par
\par
\par
\f1\lang1049\par
\par
}
TxtContent:
###ENGLISH. Current work.
2019. May. STUDY ARTICLE 22 Improve Your Study Habits!

p. 1 - 4.

1. Why might some not be inclined to study?
IT TAKES a great deal of effort to earn a living these days. Many of our brothers work long hours just to provide the necessities of life for their families. Countless others spend several hours each workday traveling to and from their place of employment. Many support themselves by doing hard physical labor. By the end of the day, these hardworking brothers and sisters are exhausted! The last thing many are inclined to do is study.

2. 


##эти выражения я хочу очень хорошо усвоить и использовать
a great deal of effort - много усилий
a great deal of - значительное количество; изрядное количество; много
to earn a living - зарабатывать на жизнь
the necessities of life - предметы первой необходимости
they are exhausted.
to be inclined - быть склонным
countless 
labor труд / трудиться
necessity for a decision
in case of necessity
necessity is the mother of invention - (посл) голь на выдумки хитра 
+нужда - мать изобретательности
Shortage нехватка, дефицит, недостаток, недобор
острая нехватка desperate shortage
растрогать кого-л. до глубины души - to pull at smb.'s heartstrings
by the end of the day

At the same time
At the same time, it gives our delegation a great deal of food for thought.

I lack the courage to interfere. 
It's mercy, compassion, and forgiveness I lack.

Many of these people lack the basic necessities of life.
deprived of the bare necessities of life — лишенный самого необходимого.
